alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:14AM CDT until June 26 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 514 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Haynesville, or 9 miles northwest of Homer, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homer, Haynesville, Lisbon, Lake Clairborne, Antioch, Aycock and Summerfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
